name: Dark Birthday Beta
description:
Welcome to Dark Birthday!

Dark Birthday is 3D horror escape game.

You were going to have a birthday party, but your parents are busy and your friends are busy too. So you went to buy a cake for a birthday party alone, but you were kidnapped by something. Escape from here right now.

danger: loud sounds

made with gamemaker

System Requirements(Minimum)

CPU: info

CPU SPEED: 1.4 GHz or faster

RAM: 1GB

OS: Windows 7/8/10

VIDEO CARD: intel HD graphics or newer

FREE DISK SPACE: 7MB
